module.title: toponyms
module.p: Toponyms are names identifying places and other geographical entities.
Like other kinds of name, toponyms can be classified into two distinct grammatical types â€“

ul.li: toponymic proper nouns eg. Glaschu Glasgow, Alba Nuadh Nova Scotia
toponymic name-descriptions eg. Am Ploc Plockton, Ceann Loch Chille Chiarain Campbeltown
